column4: what's the difference between installing an app from sudo apt-get install and compiling from source "tar, unzip, make, make install"...
Kessel: haha...i definitely noticed that, but i was wondering if i was trading something for the simplicity in the process....
I see....so why would anyone want to install from source other than to flex their geek elitocracy? :P
getting the very latest version from the upstream author
